data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Shuxia, Jia, Yanyan (2019): Taxonomic study of the genus Promalactis Meyrick, 1908 (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae) IV. The sakaiella species group, with descriptions of fifteen new species. Zootaxa 4563 (3): 491-515, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.3.5|42 occurrences
